title: Why Dubai is a booming hotspot for fintech startups
content:
The Middle East and North Africa (MENA) is becoming a leading destination for fast-growing tech startups. In 2020, the region reached a record $1 billion in startup investments, signaling a voracious investor appetite in the technology sector. The maturing digital economy coupled with region-wide innovation initiatives make MENA an attractive place to launch or scale a startup for an increasing number of global entrepreneurs. Heavy hitters like Microsoft, Google, and Amazon are also investing in the region, and recent investments are trending towards later-stage deals, indicating that the land is ripe for opportunity. For fintechs in particular, Dubai has become…

description: Find out why fintech founders are choosing Dubai as the spot to launch or scale their fintech to the MENA region.
